verdict.feature_description: Automatically translates user messages in real-time and stores translated history for future retrieval.
verdict.reasoning: The feature collects personal data (text messages, User ID, Language preference, Device ID, IP Address), processes this data using AI models, stores it for 90 days in AWS Frankfurt, and shares it with third parties. This activity is subject to various regulations across different jurisdictions. GDPR requires explicit consent from users and imposes strict data protection rules. CCPA also demands disclosure of personal data collection and sale practices to California residents. IT Act 2000 (India) regulates the handling and protection of sensitive personal data, including the obligation to obtain user consent for sharing data with third parties.

EU.requirement_summary: Compliance with GDPR is required, including obtaining explicit consent from users, implementing strict data protection rules, and providing users with access to their personal data upon request.

regulations.name: GDPR
regulations.snippet: Article 6 – Lawfulness of processing, Article 12 – Rights of the data subject, Article 25 – Data protection by design and by default, Article 34 – Communication of a personal data breach to the data subject

California.requirement_summary: Compliance with CCPA is required, including disclosing personal data collection and sale practices to California residents.

regulations.name: CCPA
regulations.snippet: Section 1798.100 – Definitions, Section 1798.110 – Consumer’s right to know about personal information sold or disclosed, Section 1798.130 – Requirements for businesses that sell personal information

India.requirement_summary: Compliance with IT Act 2000 (India) is required, including obtaining user consent for sharing data with third parties.

regulations.name: IT Act 2000
regulations.snippet: Section 43A – Duty of the body corporate to protect sensitive personal data or information, Section 72A – Penalties for disclosure of information in breach of lawful contract, Section 68B – Sensitive personal data or information
